resources.string: You need to pick a user for this site. Go back and long-click on a site to do that.
An error occurred while retrieving the list of StackExchange sites. Please try again in a few moments.
An error occurred while retrieving your profile information. Please try again in a few moments.
An error has occurred while adding this site. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again in a few moments.
An error has occurred while retrieving the list of questions. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again in a few moments.
An error has occurred while retrieving this question. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again in a few moments.
An error has occurred while retrieving the list of answers. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again in a few moments.
An error has occurred while retrieving the list of sites. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again in a few moments.
An error has occurred while retrieving the list of reputation changes. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again in a few moments.
An error has occurred while retrieving the profile data. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again in a few moments.
An error has occurred while retrieving the list of tags. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again in a few moments.
An error has occurred while retrieving the list of users. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again in a few moments.
An error has occurred while retrieving more answers. Make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again in a few moments.
Some site icons were missing from your SD card, so I tried to refresh them. I have failed. I will now exit because otherwise I would crash.
You need a writable SD card in order to use this application.
There is no active Internet connection.
You have not picked any sites yet. Click Menu and select Pick sites to start using Droidstack.
